action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several L-shaped figures in different colors. From left to right, there is a purple cross shape, followed by green L-shaped figures, and an orange L-shaped figure. To the right of the green figures, there is a pink figure with small white square in its center. Further to the right, there is an orange L-shaped figure at the bottom, and a pink T-shaped figure at the top.
continue

DESCRIPTION: There are six differently colored Tetris-like pieces arranged in various orientations. In the center, an orange "T" shape and a yellow cross shape are present. Surrounding this central arrangement are a red "T" shape to the bottom left, a yellow "U" shape to the bottom right, a red "L" shape to the top right, and a purple "L" shape to the top center.

From left to right, there is a purple cross shape, followed by green L-shaped figures, and an orange L-shaped figure. To the right of the green figures, there is a pink figure with small white square in its center.
